summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 4053 for the improvement of the alley in block 46, Pontius' 2nd Addition Supplemental, being the alley between Summit Avenue North and Belmont Avenue North, from East Thomas Street to East Harrison Street, by paving and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 48947, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
